about.details:
Incorporated in Dec 2017, Varanium Cloud Limited is a technology company focused on providing services surrounding the digital audio, video, and financial blockchain (for PayFac) based streaming services. 

Varanium Cloud Business Verticles

  1. Provision of digital audio and video content streaming services to various content owners and telecom operators in India and internationally on a SaaS (Software As A Service) model such as Voice & Video over Internet Protocol solutions (VoIP) in the B2B and B2C segments;
  2. Online payment facilitation services (PayFac);
  3. Provision of low bandwidth digital education content platforms (EdTech) with complete Learning Management Systems (LMS) focused on non-urban areas under the Edmission brand;
  4. Provision of information technology-related services to startups and SMEs to help them transition their business to digital platforms and manage the relevant infrastructure on an IaaS (Infrastructure As A Service) model.

Varanium Cloud Product Offerings

  1. Edmission

    Edmission is a phy-gital (Physical and Digital) platform for educators and learners to come together online. It helps institutions in running digital classes. The platform has a video conferencing solution to support up to 1 million students and 2,000 teachers simultaneously.

  2. JumpTalk

    JumpTalk provides a cloud platform for video and audio conferencing, webinars, chats, and file transfers.

  3. Online payment facilitation services (Payfac)

    Payfac provides aggregated payment gateway services to non-urban consumers.

  4. Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS)

    Services including Hydra Web Solutions, Corporate & Public WiFi Mesh Services, and eCommerce-as-a-Service (EaaS).

faqs.question: What is the Varanium Cloud IPO?
faqs.answer:
Varanium Cloud IPO is a SME IPO of 3000000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹36.60 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹122 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1000.

The IPO opens on September 16, 2022, and closes on September 20, 2022.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Varanium Cloud IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Varanium Cloud IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Varanium Cloud IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Varanium Cloud IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Varanium Cloud IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Varanium Cloud IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Varanium Cloud IPO opens on September 16, 2022 and closes on September 20, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Varanium Cloud IPO?
faqs.answer: Varanium Cloud IPO lot size is 1000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,22,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Varanium Cloud IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Varanium Cloud IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Varanium Cloud IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Varanium Cloud IPO will be done on Friday, September 23, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, September 27, 2022. Check the Varanium Cloud IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Varanium Cloud IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Varanium Cloud IPO listing date is on Tuesday, September 27, 2022.
